01 SIDE STORY: BREAK THE ICE RERUN

 

DURATION: June 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 27, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)

 

UNLOCK REQUIREMENT: Clear Main Storyline 1-10

 

DETAILS: Break the Ice event stages will be open for a limited time. Players can obtain event rewards by clearing event stages, completing the event missions, and redeeming from the event shop.

 

EVENT STAGES DURATION:

 

Event Stages will open in 2 phases:

- [The Grand Ceremony] Duration: June 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 23, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)

- [Holy Hunt] Duration: June 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 27, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)

 

 

 

 

[KJERAG GUIDEBOOK]

 

DETAILS: During the event, players can complete [Kjerag Guidebook] missions by clearing event stages to gain rewards.

 

MAIN REWARDS: ★★★★★: Kjera, Kjerag-Style Inn Furniture (Pieces), Stone of Kjeragandr.

 


[TURICUM TRADE ZONE]

 

DURATION: June 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 27, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)

 

DETAILS: During the event, players can obtain Stone of Kjeragandr by clearing event stages. Stone of Kjeragandr can be used to redeem items from [Turicum Trade Zone].

 

MAIN REWARDS: Kjera’s Token, Kjerag-Style Inn Furniture (Pieces), Headhunting Permit, Elite Materials, LMD, Battle Records, etc.

 

NOTE:

- The requirements to obtain certain medals of this event have been updated. Players who have participated in the original event and met the adjusted requirements will receive the corresponding medals once log in.

- Once the rerun ends, the Medal Set of this event can no longer be obtained via any method, including the [Side Story].

- This event rerun will carry on the stage progress and First Clear progress.

- The once-only rewards in the rerun will automatically be converted to Intelligence Certificates for players who have already claimed them. Please refer to [Intelligence Certificate Conversion Rules] for more details.

- [Intelligence Certificate Area] will be restocked as the event rerun begins. In addition, new redeemable will be added.

- Operators Gnosis, Kjera, and Aurora will gain more trust during the event rerun.

- The event stages will be permanently added to the [Side Story] after the end of the event at 04:00 on June 27 (UTC-7).

 

 

 

 

02 LIMITED-TIME HEADHUNTING RERUN – EDELWEISS' VOW

 

DURATION: June 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 27, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)

 

DETAILS: During the event, the Limited-time Headhunting, "Edelweiss' Vow", opens and the following Operators will appear at a higher rate from this Standard Headhunting:

 

★★★★★★: Gnosis

★★★★★: Aurora / Pramanix

 

 

 

 

03 EPOQUE COLLECTION NEW ARRIVALS AT OUTFIT STORE

 

DURATION: June 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 27, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)

 

DETAILS: The following re-edition Outfits will be available at the Store, including:

 

EPOQUE Collection - Ingenious Servant for Kjera

 

 

 

 

04 ICEFIELD MESSENGER COLLECTION RE-EDITION AT OUTFIT STORE

 

DURATION: June 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 27, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)

 

DETAILS: The following Outfits will be available at the Store, including:

 

Icefield Messenger Collection - Hohenlohe Chillysand for Carnelian

Icefield Messenger Collection - Hope Cruise for Leonhardt

Icefield Messenger Collection - Cardboard Fairy for Kafka

 

 

 

 

Icefield Messenger Collection - Candy Cape for Weedy

Icefield Messenger Collection - Snowy Echo for Elysium

Icefield Messenger Collection - Snowywatch for Firewatch

 

 

 

 

05 RE-EDITION FURNITURE SET - KJERAG-STYLE INN

 

DURATION: June 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 27, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)

 

DETAILS: This furniture set will be available again during the event.

 

HOW TO OBTAIN:

- Break the Ice event rewards and redeem in Turicum Trade Zone (Pieces)

- Limited-time sale at the Store (Pieces) from June 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) to June 27, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)

 

 

 

 

06 RECORD RESTORATION: PRELUDING LIGHTS

 

UPDATE TIME: June 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7)

 

DETAILS: The Record Restoration of Preluding Lights will be open after the next update. The limited event rewards will be permanently available for players to unlock.

2023 [THANK-YOU CELEBRATION] LIMITED-TIME EVENTS

 

 

01 2023 [THANK-YOU CELEBRATION] SIDE STORY: IL SIRACUSANO OPEN

 

DETAILS: IL Siracusano event stages will be open for a limited time. Players can obtain event rewards by clearing event stages, completing the Solo Actions, and redeeming from Event Store.


UNLOCK REQUIREMENT: Clear Main Storyline 1-10


EVENT STAGES DURATION: Event Stages will open in 3 phases:


- Phase 1
DURATION: May 23, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 13, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)
Open Stages: Stagione delle Piogge

- Phase 2
DURATION: May 30, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 13, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)
Open Stages: Pistole e Ordine

- Phase 3
DURATION: June 6, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 13, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)
Open Stages: Terra Desolata Autoproclamata

 

 

 

 

Azione Solo


DETAILS: During the event, players can complete Azione Solo tasks in [Volsinii] to gain rewards.


MAIN REWARDS: Vigil's Folder (When first obtained, players will receive the event bonus Operator ★★★★★★: Vigil, after which you can use it to increase his potential), Siracusan Court of Justice Furniture (Pieces), Module Materials, Elite Materials, LMD, Battle Records, etc.

Menù del Banchetto


DETAILS: During the event, players can complete [Menù del Banchetto] missions by clearing event stages to gain rewards.


MAIN REWARDS: Siracusan Court of Justice Furniture (Pieces), Module Materials, Permesso di Importazione, etc.

Dipartimento di Sicurezza Alimentare


DURATION: May 23, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 20, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: During the event, you can collect [Permesso di Importazione] by participating the event and use them to redeem items as rewards.


MAIN REWARDS: Siracusan Court of Justice Furniture (Pieces), Headhunting Permits, Module Materials, Elite Materials, LMD, Battle Records, Furniture Parts, and more.

 

- During this event, the event stories cannot be reviewed in Public Affairs. After the event ends, the event stories will be recorded in Public Affairs.

 

 

 

 

02 LIMITED-TIME HEADHUNTING OPEN – THROUGH A PATH OF BRIARS

 

DURATION: May 23, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 6, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: During the event, the Limited-time Headhunting, [Through A Path of Briars], opens and the following Operators will appear at a higher rate from this Limited Headhunting:


★★★★★★: Texas the Omertosa (Limited) / Penance
★★★★★★: Nearl the Radiant Knight (Limited) / Skadi the Corrupting Heart (Limited) / Rosmontis (Limited)
★★★★★: Lunacub

 

NOTE:
- [Through A Path of Briars] is part of the [Limited Headhunting - Celebration] headhunting series.
- [Limited Headhunting - Celebration] is Limited Headhunting.
- Operator Texas the Omertosa is currently ONLY available from the [Limited Headhunting - Celebration], and is NOT available in any Standard Headhunting.
- NOTE: Please refer to the official notice of this Limited Headhunting for more details.

 

 

 

 

03 2023 [THANK-YOU CELEBRATION] SPECIAL LOGIN EVENT OPEN

 

DURATION: May 23, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 6, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: Log in during the event to claim reward on event page: Stepping into Lupine Shadows Headhunting Permit * 1



NOTE:
- Stepping into Lupine Shadows Headhunting Permit can only be used to performing a 10-roll in [Through A Path of Briars] Limited Headhunting.
- Each account can only claim this reward once during the event.
- Stepping into Lupine Shadows Headhunting Permit expires at: June 6, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)

 

 

 

 

04 2023 [THANK-YOU CELEBRATION] DAILY FREE ROLL IN [THROUGH A PATH OF BRIARS] LIMITED HEADHUNTING

 

DURATION: May 23, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 6, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: A free roll can be performed every day during the event in [Through A Path of Briars] Limited Headhunting.



NOTE:
- Daily Free Roll will be refreshed at 04:00 (UTC-7) every day.
- Daily Free Roll can only be used once a day and will not accumulate.

 

 

 

 

05 2023 [THANK-YOU CELEBRATION] RAIN SEASON LOGIN EVENT OPEN


DURATION: May 23, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 6, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: During the event, players can log in for 10 days to receive generous rewards, including: Emergency Sanity Concentrate, Exclusive Outfit for Quercus, Orundum, Elite Materials, and more.



Day 1: Emergency Sanity Concentrate * 1, Recruitment Permit * 5
Day 2: Data Supplement Stick * 10, Skill Summary - 1 * 30
Day 3: Expedited Plan * 5, Orundum * 200
Day 4: Furniture Part * 300, EPOQUE Collection - Distant Home's Guide for Quercus * 1
Day 5: Data Supplement Instrument * 5, LMD * 30000
Day 6: Transmuted Salt Agglomerate * 1, Transmuted Salt * 3
Day 7: Skill Summary - 3 * 8, Tactical Battle Record * 20
Day 8: Pure Gold * 20, Orundum * 200
Day 9: Chip Catalyst * 1, Skill Summary - 2 * 20
Day 10: Module Data Block * 1, LMD * 30000



NOTE: Please refer to the in-game info for the expiration time of the Emergency Sanity Concentrate from this event.

 

 

 

 

06 2023 [THANK-YOU CELEBRATION] OPERATORS UPDATE IN PURCHASE CERTIFICATES STORE

 

DETAILS: The following Operators will be added to the Purchase Certificates Store.

★★★★★: Qanipalaat

★★★★: Quartz


UPDATE TIME: May 23, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: New operators Qanipalaat and Quartz can be redeemed at the Purchase Certificates Store. Operator Qanipalaat and Quartz are NOT available in any Standard Headhunting or Recruit.

 

 

 

 

07 2023 [THANK-YOU CELEBRATION] NEW OPERATOR NOW AVAILABLE!

 

DETAILS: The following Operators will be added to the game.


★★★★★★: Texas the Omertosa (Limited)
★★★★★★: Penance
★★★★★★: Vigil
★★★★★: Lunacub
★★★★★: Qanipalaat
★★★★: Quartz


DETAILS:
- Operator Texas the Omertosa is currently ONLY available from the [Limited Headhunting - Celebration], and is NOT available in any Standard Headhunting.
- Operator Vigil is currently ONLY available to be obtained from event IL Siracusano, and is NOT available in any Standard Headhunting or Recruit.
- Operator Qanipalaat and Quartz can be redeemed at the Purchase Certificates Store, and is NOT available in any Standard Headhunting or Recruit.
- Operator Texas the Omertosa, Penance, Vigil, and Lunacub will gain more trust in the event stages.

- Players who purchased Cambrian - Winter Messenger for Texas or EPOQUE - Willpower for Texas with Originite Primes before 5/23, 05:00 (UTC-7), will receive an Outfit Voucher via mail on 5/25, 10:00 (UTC-7).

 

 

 

 

08 2023 [THANK-YOU CELEBRATION] EPOQUE COLLECTION NEW ARRIVALS AND RE-EDITION AT OUTFIT STORE

 

DURATION: May 23, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 20, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: The following new Outfits will be available at the Outfit Store, including:

 

- EPOQUE Collection - Dream In A Moment for Passenger
- EPOQUE Collection - Become Anew for Rosmontis
- EPOQUE Collection - Relight for Nearl the Radiant Knight
- EPOQUE Collection - Wildness Behind for Honeyberry
- EPOQUE Collection - Melodiosa for Sora

 

 

 

 

The following re-edition Outfits will be available at the Outfit Store, including:

 

- EPOQUE Collection - Heritage for Pallas
- EPOQUE Collection - Masterpiece for Rosa
- EPOQUE Collection - Silent Arrow for Andreana
- EPOQUE Collection - Willpower for Texas
- EPOQUE Collection - Lieutenant for Dobermann

 

 

 

 

09 2023 [THANK-YOU CELEBRATION] RHODES FASHION REVIEW OPEN

 

DURATION: May 23, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 20, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: 52 Outfit will be available at the Outfit Store, including: EPOQUE Collection - Spellbreaker for Mostima, Vitafield [Foruiner] Series - Lostlands Flowering for Suzuran, EPOQUE Collection - Starseeker for Astesia.

 

 

 

 

10 2023 [THANK-YOU CELEBRATION] NEW FURNITURE SET – 'SIRACUSAN RETRO' & SIRACUSAN COURT OF JUSTICE


DETAILS: Brand new set of themed Furniture, 'Siracusan Retro', and Siracusan Court of Justice will be available during the event.


'Siracusan Retro'


HOW TO OBTAIN:
- Limited-time sale at the Store: May 23, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 20, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)

 

 

 

 

Siracusan Court of Justice


HOW TO OBTAIN:
- IL Siracusano event rewards and redeem in Azione Solo, Menù del Banchetto, Dipartimento di Sicurezza Alimentare (Pieces)
- Limited-time sale at the Store (Pieces): May 23, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 20, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)

 

 

 

 

11 2023 [THANK-YOU CELEBRATION] NULAITEBURGH INDUSTRY COOPERATION FORUM

 

DURATION: May 23, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 6, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: During the event, players can obtain Orundum by signing contracts every day, using different negotiation strategies can effectively influence the contract outcome. Possible contract outcomes are: Windfall Contract, Perfect Contract, Successful Contract, Guaranteed Contract.

 

- Windfall Contract base value: 600 Orundum, Perfect Contract base value: 500 Orundum, Successful Contract base value: 400 Orundum, Guaranteed Contract base value: 300 Orundum. Contract values may vary based on industry circumstances.
- Sign an agreement with all corporations from a single industry to be recognized as an industry partner and receive Special Development Funds worth 500 Orundum!
- Using a negotiation strategy does not guarantee that you will be able to achieve a certain contract type.
- You can negotiate once per day. Negotiation window resets at 04:00 daily.

 

 

 

 

12 2023 [THANK-YOU CELEBRATION] CELEBRATION PACKS AVAILABLE FOR A LIMITED-TIME


DETAILS: During the event, the following packs will be available from the Store for a limited time.

Sora's Change Purse


DURATION: May 23, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 20, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


CONTENTS: Originite Prime * 13, LMD * 300000

Emperor's Briefcase


DURATION: May 23, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 20, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


CONTENTS: Originite Prime * 16, LMD * 700000



Senior Operator Training Pack


DURATION: May 23, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 20, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


CONTENTS: Originite Prime * 24, Senior Operator Training Invitation Letter * 1
Senior Operator Training Invitation Letter: You can promote a hired ★5 Operator to Elite 2 Lv.1 (effective for Operators under Elite 2 Lv.1). Upgrade materials already spent will not be returned.



Rhodes Island Headhunting Pack


DURATION: May 23, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 20, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


CONTENTS: Thank-You Celebration Operator Permit * 1, Ten-roll Headhunting Permit * 1
Thank-You Celebration Operator Permit: Allows you to select a 6-star Operator from all past Standard Headhunting up to and including 'Roaring Cliffrunner':
Ch'en, Blaze, Exusiai, Siege, Ifrit, Hoshiguma, Shining, SilverAsh, Nightingale, Eyjafjalla, Hellagur, Saria, Mostima, Bagpipe, Aak, Magallan, Phantom, Skadi, Angelina, Schwarz, Ceobe, Weedy, Rosa, Suzuran, Thorns, Eunectes, Surtr, Blemishine, Mudrock, Mountain, Archetto, Saga, Passenger, Kal'tsit, Carnelian, Pallas, Mizuki, Saileach, Fartooth, Flametail, Gnosis, Lee, Goldenglow, Fiammetta, Horn.



NOTE:
Please refer to the in-game info for the expiration time of the Thank-You Celebration Operator Permit from this event.

 

 

 

 

Special Training Pack


DURATION: May 23, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 20, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


CONTENTS: Originite Prime * 11, Senior Operator Training Apparatus * 1

Senior Operator Training Apparatus: You can promote a hired ★5 Operator to Elite 2 Lv.80 (effective for Elite 2 Operators). Upgrade materials already spent will not be returned.


Advanced Special Training Pack


DURATION: May 23, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 20, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


CONTENTS: Originite Prime * 19, Top Operator Training Apparatus * 1


Top Operator Training Apparatus: You can promote a hired ★6 Operator to Elite 2 Lv.90 (effective for Elite 2 Operators). Upgrade materials already spent will not be returned.



'Friend of the Theater' Pack


DURATION: May 23, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 20, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


CONTENTS: Originite Prime * 90, Ten-roll Headhunting Permit * 1, LMD * 260000, Strategic Battle Record * 30, Tactical Battle Record * 40, Frontline Battle Record * 30, Skill Summary - 3 * 30, Skill Summary - 2 * 40, Chip Catalyst * 4, Furniture Part * 500

 

 

 

 

13 2023 [THANK-YOU CELEBRATION] CHIP PACKS AVAILABLE FOR A LIMITED-TIME

 

Cleave a Path Chip Pack


DURATION: May 23, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 6, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


CONTENTS: Specialist Chip Pack * 8, Specialist Chip * 5, LMD * 210000



Through the Briars Chip Pack


DURATION: May 23, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - June 6, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


CONTENTS: Defender Chip Pack * 8, Defender Chip * 5, LMD * 210000

 

 

 

 

14 2023 [THANK-YOU CELEBRATION] RECRUITMENT OPERATORS UPDATE

 

UPDATE TIME: May 23, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: After the update, the following Operators will be permanently added to Recruitment.


★★★★★★: Weedy
★★★★★: Elysium
★★★★★: Asbestos
★★★★★: Tsukinogi


NOTE:
During the update, those tags that has not started recruitment will be mandatorily refreshed. Please refer to the official announcements for details on the mandatory refresh and related compensation.

items.title: MAIN STORYLINE: RETURN TO MIST OPEN

content.value:
01 MAIN THEME EPISODE 11: RETURN TO MIST OPEN

 

OPENS AT: April 27, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7)

 

UNLOCK REQUIREMENT: Clear 10-19 in the Main Theme Episode 10: Shatterpoint

 

 

 

 

[THE BOOK OF THE TOWER KNIGHT]


OPENS AT: April 27, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7)

 

UNLOCK REQUIREMENT: Clear Main Storyline 1-10


DETAILS: By clearing stages of Main Theme: Return To Mist in different environments, you can unlock the content of The Book of the Tower Knight and obtain the corresponding rewards.


MAIN REWARDS: ★★★★★: Dagda, Dagda's Token, Icon 'Sighs of Kings', Plaque - Murder, Plaque - Insight, Elite Materials, LMD, and more

 

 

 

 

02 RETURN TO MIST ENCOURAGE EVENT OPEN

 

DURATION: April 27, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - May 11, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: During the event, fail to challenge uncleared stages in Return To Mist will refund all Sanity consumed.

 

 

 

 

03 RETURN TO MIST LIMITED-TIME DROP EVENT OPEN

 

DURATION: April 27, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - May 11, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: During the event, all stages that consume Sanity, except for Annihilation, Intermezzi, and Side Story stages, will have a chance to drop the following items for a limited time.


- Emergency Sanity Sampler (Use to restore 10 Sanity)
- Rhodes Island Supplies (Use to get randomly specified Materials)

 

NOTE:

Emergency Sanity Samplers from this event will expire on May 22, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)

 

 

 

 

04 LIMITED-TIME HEADHUNTING OPEN – BEARINGS AND SPARKS

 

DURATION: April 27, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - May 11, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: During the event, the Limited-time Headhunting, [Bearings And Sparks], opens and the following Operators will appear at a higher rate from this Standard Headhunting:

★★★★★★: Stainless
★★★★★: Paprika / Cliffheart
★★★★: Totter

 

 

 

 

05 NEW OPERATORS AVAILABLE

 

DETAILS: The following Operators will be added to the game.


★★★★★★: Stainless
★★★★★: Paprika
★★★★★: Dagda
★★★★: Totter

 

NOTE:
- New Operator Dagda can only be obtained in The Book of the Tower Knight of Episode 11: Return To Mist, and is NOT available in any Standard Headhunting or Recruit.
- During April 27, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) to May 11, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7), Operator Stainless, Paprika, Dagda, and Totter will gain more Trust from all stages that consume Sanity, except for Annihilation, Intermezzi, and Side Story stages.

 

 

 

 

06 WITCH FEAST SERIES CLASSICS NEW ARRIVAL AT OUTFIT STORE

 

DURATION: April 27, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - May 18, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: The following Outfits will be available at the Outfit Store, including:

- Witch Feast Series - Trust Your Eyes for Lee
- Witch Feast Series - Mirror Visitor for Iris

- Witch Feast Series - Like Illusion for Kazemaru

 

 

 

 

07 SHINING STEPS SERIES RE-EDITION AT OUTFIT STORE

 

DURATION: April 27, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - May 11, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: The following Re-edition Outfits will be available at the Outfit Store, including:

- Shining Steps Series - Publicity Strategy for Archetto
- Shining Steps Series - Frlibe on the Palace for Astesia

 

 

 

 

08 AMBIENCE SYNESTHESIA RE-EDITION AT OUTFIT STORE

 

DURATION: April 27, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - May 11, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: The following Re-edition Outfits will be available at the Outfit Store, including:

- Ambience Synesthesia/II Tailor-Provided - Obsidian for Mudrock
- Ambience Synesthesia/II Tailor-Provided - Cardwinner for Tequila
- Ambience Synesthesia/II Tailor-Provided - Emerald Holiday for Reed

 

 

 

 

- Ambience Synesthesia Tailor-Provided - Burst Feline for Blaze
- Ambience Synesthesia Tailor-Provided - Speechless Sound for Courier
- Ambience Synesthesia Tailor-Provided - Black Wave for Vigna

 

 

 

 

09 NEW FURNITURE SET - SAINT-MARSOL CLASSROOM

 

DURATION: April 27, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - May 11, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)

 

DETAILS: A brand new set of themed Furniture, Saint-Marsol Classroom, will be available at the Store.

【CHALLENGERS ASSEMBLE: BARRAGE FORTRESS!】

 

A Rhodes Islander not playing "Soldiers Assemble: Barrage Fortress" is pretty much like not making risk 18 in Contingency Contract, or not using the Spearhead Squad in Integrated Strategies, or, I think I had some more of these. Anyway, it's a life of not having enough Strategic Battle Records.

- Closure's Review

 

In order to increase the popularity of the game and compete for the R.I. Game of The Year (Aka GOTY) Award, Closure is now holding a "Challengers Assemble: Barrage Fortress!" contest on Rhodes Island. The top 20 players on the leaderboard of the BF-3 stage will be awarded Clostore exclusive rewards!

 

HOW TO PARTICIPATE:

 

After clearing Soldiers Assemble: Barrage Fortress! stage BF-3, take a screenshot of your score leaderboard screen and submit it along with the required information (such as your contact email, UID, in-game nickname, etc.) in the form linked below.

 

*Any personal information requested will be used only for the purpose of gathering information for this event and will not be publicly displayed in any form.

 

*The final result will be displayed with both your In-game Nickname and BF-3 Stage Score.

 

Submit here: https://forms.gle/jQV2UuzcNtkZu41v6

 

SUBMISSION DURATION:

 

April 1, 10:00 (UTC-7) - April 8, 03:59 (UTC-7)

 

SUBMISSION REQUIREMENTS:

 

All score screenshots should be in-game screenshots in image format. JPG, PNG, etc.

 

Image editing, such as changing the number of scores, is NOT allowed.

 

NOTE:

 

The official SNS account will update the top 20 leaderboards on Apr. 3 and Apr. 6 based on the information provided by the players who submitted the forms (the process of counting the form data may cause some delay in updating the leaderboards), and the leaderboards updated at the end of the event on Apr. 9 will be the final results used to award the rewards.

 

During the event, each player can submit their score multiple times, but the final result will be based on each player's highest score. In case of a tie, the player who submitted the score first will be ranked first.

 

You will need to use a third-party account to log in to the submission website.

 

Please make sure all your information is correct, we are not responsible for problems caused by incorrect information provided.

 

Within one week after the event, we will contact the players who have won the rewards at the email address they provided in the form, please check the email from arknights.event@yo-star.com. If you do not respond within one week, your reward will be considered forfeited.

 

Yostar Games - Arknights Operation Team reserves the right for the final interpretation of this contest.

 

REWARDS:

SEASON DETAILS: During the season, players can combine different "Contracts" to clear stages, complete challenges, improve level evaluation, and collect "Contract Bounty" and "Operation Agreement."

- "Contract Bounty" can be used to redeem rewards in "Secret Sanctuary."

- "Operation Agreement" can be used to unlock more Contingency Contract contents.


CROSS-SEASON "SECRET SANCTUARY" OPEN

 

Cross-Season Permanent Trade Center New Arrivals:

MARTHE Collection - Rest Between Sets for Broca

EPOQUE Collection - Unknown Journey for Gitano (Re-edition)

Season #10 Furniture – Ashring Pennant

 

Season #10 Special Trade Center Supplies: Elite Materials, LMD, Furniture Parts, Battle Records, Chips, etc.

 

DURATION: February 3, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - February 17, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


NOTE:

- You do not need Sanity to play Contingency Contract stages.

- You need a certain number of completed Contracts to unlock some other Contracts. Please note that the number of completed Contracts DOES NOT EQUAL to Contingency Level.

- Compared with Season #9, Season #10 still has 8 sites in total, but has replaced 2 sites from the previous Season. There will be a new Rotating Site and a new Permanent Site, and the Permanent Site from last Season will be added into Rotating Sites. During the season, there will be 1 Permanent Site and 7 Rotating Sites (rotating daily) for you to challenge. (The first Rotating Site's rotation time and its corresponding challenges on the first day of the event will be extended by 1 day.)

- Several new Contracts and challenges will be added to the Season's Permanent Site on February 10, 2023, 04:00 (UTC-7).

- After Season #10 ends, the unused Contract Bounty will be retained.

- After Season #10 ends, all the Operation Agreements you have collected this season will be automatically converted into Operation Ashring Supplies. The ratio is 1:1.

- During Season #10, you will receive Credits if your Support Units have helped others in clearing their Contingency Contract stages.

- During Season #10, players can obtain Season #10 Engraved Medal Set by achieving related goals.

 

 

 

 

02 TARGETED OPERATOR HEADHUNTING OPEN: JOINT OPERATION

 

DURATION: February 3, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - February 17, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)

 

DETAILS: During the event, the Targeted Operator Headhunting, [Joint Operation], opens and ONLY the following Operators will appear in the 6* and 5* Operator List of this Standard Headhunting:

★★★★★★: Bagpipe / Carnelian / Magallan / Passenger

★★★★★: Mr. Nothing / Shamare / Toddifons / Mulberry / La Pluma / Skyfire

 

 

 

 

03 SUPPLIES & CHIPS EVERYDAY ACCESS

 

DURATION: February 3, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - February 17, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)

 

DETAILS: All stages in Supplies and Chips stay open during the period above.

 

 

 

 

04 RECORD RESTORATION: TWILIGHT OF WOLUMONDE

 

UPDATE TIME: February 3, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7)

 

DETAILS: The Record Restoration of Twilight of Wolumonde will be open after the next update. The limited event rewards will be permanently available for players to unlock.

items.title: Rhodes Island Central Kitchen - New Year's Gourmet Feast Collection - Announcing the Winners

content.value:
Dear Doctors,

 

Thank you all for your enthusiastic participation in this event! The Rhode Island Central Kitchen is ready for the New Year's feast, and Operators are excited to taste the first feast of 2023! But before everyone starts, let's see what dishes have won the taste and favor of the Operators and Judges!

 

 

 

 

Amiya: Well, no more waiting, the New Year feast is ready! Let's taste these amazing dishes from our top chefs and enjoy this moment!

items.title: SIDESTORY: IDEAL CITY: ENDLESS CARNIVAL OPEN

content.value:
01 [3RD ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATION] SIDE STORY: IDEAL CITY: ENDLESS CARNIVAL OPEN

 

DURATION: January 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - February 10, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


UNLOCK REQUIREMENT: Clear Main Storyline 1-10


DETAILS: Ideal City: Endless Carnival event stages will be open for a limited time. Players can obtain event rewards by clearing event stages, completing the event missions, and redeeming from event shop.



EVENT STAGES DURATION: Event Stages will open in 3 phases:


Phase 1
DURATION: January 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - February 3, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)
Open Stages:
[Underground Sightseeing]
[Self-Driving Cart Racetrack] Exhibition Course

Phase 2
DURATION: January 20, 2023, 16:00 (UTC-7) - February 3, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)
Open Stages:
[Cultural Shock]
[Self-Driving Cart Racetrack] Ultimate Course

Phase 3
DURATION: January 27, 2023, 16:00 (UTC-7) - February 3, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)
Open Stages:
[Elevator Maintenance]

 

 

 

 

[City Forum]


DETAILS: During the event, players can complete [City Forum] missions by clearing event stages, collecting gear from [Backyard Garage], participating in the [Engine Club], and challenging [Self-Driving Cart Racetrack] stages to gain rewards.


MAIN REWARDS: ★★★★★: Minimalist, Great Aquapit Funtastic Experientorium Furniture (Pieces), Photocopies of 'Stranger Things', Self-Driving Cart Gear, Module Materials, Elite Materials, LMD, and more.

Leaping Gloompincer Market


DURATION: January 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - February 10, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: During the event, you can collect [Photocopies of 'Stranger Things'] by participating the event and use them to redeem items as rewards.


MAIN REWARDS: ★★★★★: Minimalist's Token, Great Aquapit Funtastic Experientorium Furniture (Pieces), Headhunting Permit, Module Materials, Elite Materials, LMD, Battle Records, Furniture Parts, and more.

More details will be announced on official social media accounts.
During this event, the event stories cannot be reviewed in Public Affairs. After the event ends, the event stories will be recorded in Public Affairs.

 

 

 

 

02 [3RD ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATION] LIMITED-TIME HEADHUNTING OPEN – GREAT AXE AND PEN NIB

DURATION: January 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - January 27, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: During the event, the Limited-time Headhunting, [Great Axe and Pen Nib], opens and the following Operators will appear at a higher rate from this Limited Headhunting:
★★★★★★: Gavial the Invincible (Limited) / Pozëmka
★★★★★★: Ch'en the Holungday (Limited)
★★★★★: Cantabile

NOTE:
[Great Axe and Pen Nib] is part of the [Limited Headhunting - Anniversary] headhunting series.
[Limited Headhunting - Anniversary] is Limited Headhunting.
Operator Pozëmka and Cantabile will be permanently added to other Headhuntings in future update.
Operator Gavial the Invincible is currently ONLY available from the [Limited Headhunting - Anniversary], and is NOT available in any Standard Headhunting.
Operator Gavial the Invincible will not be available from other Limited Headhunting.
NOTE: Please refer to the official notice of this Limited Headhunting for more details.

 

 

 

 

03 [3RD ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATION] LIMITED-TIME LOGIN EVENT OPEN

 

DURATION: January 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - January 27, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: Log in during the event to claim reward on event page: Tempered into Poetry Headhunting Permit * 1

NOTE:
Tempered into Poetry Headhunting Permit can only be used to performing a 10-roll in [Great Axe and Pen Nib] Limited Headhunting.
Each account can only claim this reward once during the event.
Tempered into Poetry Headhunting Permit expires at: January 27, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)

 

 

 

 

04 [3RD ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATION] DAILY FREE ROLL IN [GREAT AXE AND PEN NIB] LIMITED HEADHUNTING

DURATION: January 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - January 27, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: A free roll can be performed every day during the event in [Great Axe and Pen Nib] Limited Headhunting.


NOTE:
Daily Free Roll will be refreshed at 04:00 (UTC-7) every day.
Daily Free Roll can only be used once a day and will not accumulate.

 

 

 

 

05 [3RD ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATION] NEW OPERATORS AVAILABLE IN HEADHUNTING

 

DETAILS: The following Operators will be added to the game.
★★★★★★: Gavial the Invincible (Limited)
★★★★★★: Pozëmka
★★★★★: Cantabile
★★★★★: Minimalist



NOTE:
Operator Minimalist is currently ONLY available to be obtained from event Ideal City: Endless Carnival, and is NOT available in any Standard Headhunting or Recruit.
Operator Gavial the Invincible, Pozëmka, Cantabile, and Minimalist will gain more trust in the event stages.

 

 

 

 

06 [3RD ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATION] WELCOME TO THE UNDERGROUND LOGIN EVENT

 

DURATION: January 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - January 27, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: During the event, players can log in for 10 days to receive generous rewards, including: Event Exclusive Furnitures, Originite Prime, Emergency Sanity Concentrate, and etc.



Day 1: Emergency Sanity Concentrate * 1, [Anniversary Wheel of Fortune] Furniture * 1
Day 2 LMD * 30000, [Glass Cabinet Fan] Furniture * 1
Day 3 Orundum * 200, Compound Cutting Fluid * 5
Day 4 Data Supplement Stick * 10, Skill Summary - 1 * 30
Day 5 Emergency Sanity Concentrate * 1, Pure Gold * 20
Day 6 Orundum * 200, Recruitment Permit * 5
Day 7 Chip Catalyst * 1, Expedited Plan * 5
Day 8 Data Supplement Stick * 10, Skill Summary - 2 * 20
Day 9 Module Data Block * 1, LMD * 30000
Day 10 Originite Prime * 1, Furniture Part * 200



NOTE: Please refer to the in-game info for the expiration time of the Emergency Sanity Concentrate from this event.

 

 

 

 

07 [3RD ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATION] ZERUERTZA AMAZING WALL EVENT OPEN

 

DURATION: January 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - January 27, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: During the event, players can get two trials for Beating Tickets after daily login. Between the Beating Tickets you picked, the one with the higher amount of Orundum will be the final daily reward. Players need to use all trials to get the reward.



NOTE:
There are 14 days at most for players to pick Beating Tickets.
Players will randomly obtain following amount of Orundum from Beating Tickets:
Orundum * 200, Orundum * 300, Orundum * 400, Orundum * 500, Orundum * 600, Orundum * 800
If the amount of Orundum in daily reward is less than 400 (400 is NOT included), players will be granted an extra trial the next day. The extra trial cannot be accumulated, players can get 3 daily trials at most (including the extra trial).
All the daily trials will be refreshed at 4:00 am on the next day and cannot be accumulated.

 

 

 

 

08 [3RD ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATION] MARTHE [CORAL COAST] NEW ARRIVALS AT OUTFIT STORE

 

DURATION: January 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - February 3, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: The following Outfits will be available at the Store, including:

MARTHE [Coral Coast] - Colorful Wonderland CW03 for Surtr
MARTHE [Coral Coast] - Shimmering Dew SDm11 for Elysium
MARTHE [Coral Coast] - Summer Flowers FA210 for La Pluma

 

 

 

 

09 [3RD ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATION] MARTHE [CORAL COAST] RE-EDITION AT OUTFIT STORE PART 1

 

DURATION: January 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - February 3, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: The following re-edition Outfits will be available at the Outfit Store, including:

MARTHE [Coral Coast] - Shimmering Dew SD01 for Nearl
MARTHE [Coral Coast] - Summer Flower FA008 for Rope

 

 

 

 

10 [3RD ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATION] MARTHE [CORAL COAST] RE-EDITION AT OUTFIT STORE PART 2

 

DURATION: January 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - February 3, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: The following re-edition Outfits will be available at the Outfit Store, including:

MARTHE [Coral Coast] - Waverider WR04 for Skadi
MARTHE [Coral Coast] - Shimmering Dew SD05 for Platinum
MARTHE [Coral Coast] - Casual Vacation HD08 for Provence

 

 

 

 

11 [3RD ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATION] MARTHE [CORAL COAST] RE-EDITION AT OUTFIT STORE PART 3

 

DURATION: January 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - February 3, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: The following re-edition Outfits will be available at the Outfit Store, including:

MARTHE [Coral Coast] - Seeker SKm01 for SilverAsh
MARTHE [Coral Coast] - Summer Flowers FA333 for Ceobe
MARTHE [Coral Coast] - Seeker SK03 for Croissant

 

 

 

 

12 [3RD ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATION] RHODES FASHION REVIEW OPEN

 

DURATION: January 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - February 3, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: 41 Outfits will be available at the Outfit Store, including: Bloodline of Combat Collection - Stronghold for Saria, Bloodline of Combat Collection - Distinguished Visitor for Angelina, Bloodline of Combat Collection - Refined Horrormare for Lappland

 

 

 

 

13 [3RD ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATION] NEW FURNITURE SET – GREAT AQUAPIT FUNTASTIC EXPERIENTORIUM

 

DETAILS: A brand new set of themed Furniture, Great Aquapit Funtastic Experientorium, will be available during the event.


HOW TO OBTAIN:
Ideal City: Endless Carnival event rewards and redeem in Leaping Gloompincer Market (Pieces)
Limited-time sale at the Store (Pieces)
Great Aquapit Funtastic Experientorium (Pieces) will be available at the Store from January 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) to February 3, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)

 

 

 

 

14 [3RD ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATION] 3RD ANNIVERSARY PACKS AVAILABLE FOR A LIMITED-TIME

 

DETAILS: During the event, the following packs will be available from the Store for a limited time.


DURATION: January 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - February 3, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)



Eunectes's Parts Bags
CONTENTS: Originite Prime * 13, Bipolar Nanoflake * 2, Crystalline Electronic Unit * 2

Duck Lord's Change Purse

Senior Operator Training Pack

Senior Operator Training Invitation Letter: You can promote a hired ★5 Operator to Elite 2 Lv.1 (effective for Operators under Elite 2 Lv.1). Upgrade materials already spent will not be returned.

 

 

 

 

15 [3RD ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATION] CHIP PACKS AVAILABLE FOR A LIMITED-TIME

 

Great Axe Chip Package
DURATION: January 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - January 27, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)

16 [3RD ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATION] RECRUITMENT OPERATORS UPDATE

 

Update Time: January 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7)


DETAILS: After the update, the following Operators will be permanently added to Recruitment.
★★★★★★: Phantom
★★★★★: Shamare
★★★★: Cutter



NOTE:
During the update, those tags that has not started recruitment will be mandatorily refreshed. Please refer to the official announcements for details on the mandatory refresh and related compensation.

 

 

 

 

17 [3RD ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATION] NEW LUCKY DROP FURNITURE SET - SUGAR POME FAIRY'S BANQUET HALL

 

UPDATE TIME: January 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7)

LUCKY DROP: Themed Furniture - Sugar Pome Fairy's Banquet Hall


HOW TO OBTAIN: By clearing Main Theme stages (excludes Challenge Mode and tutorial stages) and all Supplies stages.


DETAILS: New furniture series, Sugar Pome Fairy's Banquet Hall, will replace the current furniture series in the Lucky Drop, Avant-Garde Arcade Hall. After the replacement, Avant-Garde Arcade Hall series furniture can be purchased at the Store.
Avant-Garde Arcade Hall will be available at the Store after January 13, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7)

 

 

 

 

18 [3RD ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATION] LIMITED-TIME EVENT: #01 TRIALS FOR NAVIGATOR OPEN

 

EVENT DURATION: January 20, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - January 27, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)

 

UNLOCK REQUIREMENT: Clear Main Storyline 1-10

 

DETAILS: Trials for Navigator event stages will be open for a limited time. Players can obtain event rewards by clearing event stages, completing Trial Tasks to earn Trial EXP, and increasing the level of Path of Trials.



DURATION: January 20, 2023, 10:00 (UTC-7) - January 30, 2023, 03:59 (UTC-7)


MAIN REWARDS: MARTHE [Coral Coast] - Summer Flowers FA374 for Roberta, Headhunting Permit, Module Materials, Elite Materials, Battle Records, LMD, and more.

- More details will be announced on official social media accounts.
